sent.orig: Good afternoon, sir. What would you like to have this afternoon?
sent.trans: 下午好，先生，您今天要点些什么呢？

sent.orig: I from Friday afternoon to Sunday in the afternoon at home.
sent.trans: 我星期五下午到星期日的下午在家。

sent.orig: This afternoon's work is tiling walls. After taking an afternoon nap they are preparing for tiling.
sent.trans: 下午要做贴砖，吃过中午饭稍微休息一会，王师傅开始做铺砖前的准备工作。

sent.orig: Good afternoon and to see U at this sunny afternoon.
sent.trans: 下午好，并很高兴看到u在这个阳光下午。

sent.orig: Two days from Friday afternoon to Sunday afternoon.
sent.trans: 从星期五下午到星期天下午两天。
